/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the road below. The road itself is divided by a median, with a grassy area on the other side, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. 

Vehicles, including a red bus and a white car, are seen traversing the road, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, suggesting a bright and sunny day. 

On either side of the road, buildings rise up, their architecture hinting at the city's blend of tradition and modernity. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the vastness of the sky.
